OOC: My group can take on anyone if they could fire as much as you. I got
sick of fighting you, so my group just left. You fire too much, then
complain if I break the rules, so I ended the fight. Next time, though, I
fire as much as you. My group hardly got any damage at all, so losing? Nope,
just retreating because of sheer amount of firepower on the opposite team...
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, October 16, 2000 9:34 AM
Subject: Re: It's Battle Time!


> (Ummm...CODE, could you please tell me how I was firing more than the
maximum
> shots allow?  And what you consider cheating?  Or are you just upset about
> losing horribly?  You gotta remember something, the Alliance can take on
> ANYONE and win.  Ummm...not the CF though.  We're still scared of the CF.
> Very scared)
>
